stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Nerve Agent. Each virus counter after the first on Nerve Agent allows you to access 1 additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ.
text:
Whenever you make a successful run on HQ, place 1 virus counter on Nerve Agent.
Each virus counter after the first on Nerve Agent allows you to access 1 additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ.
title: Nerve Agent

flavor: "My enhancements are guaranteed for life, and well worth the risk."
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may gain click. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
text: When your turn begins, you may gain [click]. If you do, take 1 tag when this turn ends.
title: Joshua B.

flavor: "Think of it as a virtual shock collar for punishing corporate pets." -Andromeda
stripped_text: Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
text:
Play only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn.
Derez 1 installed piece of ice.
title: Emergency Shutdown

flavor: Light and form-fitting, its like bulletproof skin.
stripped_text: Interrupt  The first time each turn you would take meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage. Errata from CR 1.4
text:
[interrupt] – The first time each turn you would take meat damage, prevent 1 meat damage.
<errata>Errata from CR 1.4</errata>
title: Muresh Bodysuit

flavor: "A snitch is a girl's best friend." -Andromeda
stripped_text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
text: Once per run, you may expose an unrezzed piece of ice when you approach it. You may then jack out.
title: Snitch

stripped_text: +1 mu
title: Chaos Theory: Wünderkind

stripped_text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack if you searched it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
text: Search either your stack or your heap for 1 program. (Shuffle your stack if you searched it.) Install that program, ignoring all costs. When your turn ends, if that program has not been uninstalled, add it to the top of your stack.
title: Test Run

stripped_text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.
text: Dinosaurus can host a single non-AI icebreaker. The memory cost of the hosted icebreaker does not count against your memory limit. Hosted icebreaker has +2 strength. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Dinosaurus

stripped_text: click: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost. 1 credit: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card. When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.
text:
[click]: Host a program or piece of hardware from your grip on Personal Workshop and place power counters on it equal to its install cost.
1[credit]: Remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When your turn begins, remove 1 power counter from a hosted card.
When there are no power counters left on a hosted card, install it, ignoring all costs.
title: Personal Workshop

flavor: "I'm just thankful that the brain damage is reversible. With the support of the city of New Angeles, I hope to be on my feet and back to practicing my art very soon." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
stripped_text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
text: Your maximum hand size is increased by 2.
title: Public Sympathy

stripped_text: When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3. Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text:
When you score this agenda, place 1 agenda counter on it for each hosted advancement counter past 3.
Hosted agenda counter: Add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
title: Project Vitruvius

stripped_text: Subroutine Trace 3 If successful, the Runner loses click, if able. Subroutine Trace 3 If successful, end the run.
text:
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, the Runner loses [click], if able.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 3</trace> If successful, end the run.
title: Viper

stripped_text: If Edge of World is installed and you pay 3 credits when the Runner accesses it, do 1 brain damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.
text: If Edge of World is installed and you pay 3[credit] when the Runner accesses it, do 1 brain damage for each piece of ice protecting this server.
title: Edge of World

flavor: "You haven't run until you've seen the cybersun drift down behind the Great City, the space around you rippling with colors you can't imagine." -Kate "Mac" McCaffrey
stripped_text: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
text: Choose a server. Arrange the ice protecting that server in any order.
title: Sunset

stripped_text: When your turn begins, take 1 credit from Marked Accounts, if able. click: Place 3 credits from the bank on Marked Accounts.
text:
When your turn begins, take 1[credit] from Marked Accounts, if able.
[click]: Place 3[credit] from the bank on Marked Accounts.
title: Marked Accounts

flavor: "Try to close it. Go on. See what it does." -Chaos Theory
stripped_text: When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner pays 1 credit.
text:
When the Runner encounters this ice, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run unless the Runner pays 1[credit].
title: Pop-up Window

stripped_text: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.
text: Woodcutter can be advanced only while rezzed and gains "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." for each advancement token on it.
title: Woodcutter

flavor: The Division of Fringe Applications' revenue increased 37% year-over-year after corporate discovered that most of their projects made really fun toys.
stripped_text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1 credit for each advancement token on that ice.
text: Choose a piece of ice. Gain 1[credit] for each advancement token on that ice.
title: Commercialization

stripped_text: Place 14 credits from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it. click: Take 2 credits from Private Contracts.
text:
Place 14[credit] from the bank on Private Contracts when it is rezzed. When there are no credits left on Private Contracts, trash it.
[click]: Take 2[credit] from Private Contracts.
title: Private Contracts

stripped_text: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. Subroutine End the run.
text: When you rez Chimera, choose sentry, code gate, or barrier. Chimera gains that subtype until derezzed. When a turn ends, derez Chimera. [subroutine] End the run.
title: Chimera
